page.title: 02POPULATION OF NORTHWOLD
page.content: Northwold has a population of approximately 800. The majority of families have at least one member who was born and bred in Northwold.Some older residents still refer to people now living in Northwold but born elsewhere as "outsiders". There is a relatively high proportion of retired people living in the village.This is partly due to the excellent health care available.It is also due to the fact that limited employment opportunities in the immediate area have led to many young adults leaving the village to settle in the local towns. Most Northwold families comprise working father,homebased mother and two or three children.
